Consumables.name: Healing Berry Juice
Consumables.description: A refreshing juice that heals minor wounds.

Consumables.name: Elixir of Vine Insight
Consumables.description: A mystical elixir that temporarily boosts mental acuity.

Consumables.name: Invisibility Grape Extract
Consumables.description: A rare extract that grants temporary invisibility.

Consumables.name: Energy Citrus
Consumables.description: A zesty fruit that restores energy and reduces fatigue.

Consumables.name: Clarity Watermelon Water
Consumables.description: Water extracted from a clarity watermelon, enhancing focus.

Consumables.name: Arcane Berry Scroll
Consumables.description: A scroll containing a single-use powerful spell from the berry realm.

Consumables.name: Thorn Trap Kit
Consumables.description: A kit for setting up a quick and effective thorn trap.

Consumables.name: Fruit Camouflage Paint
Consumables.description: Paint for blending into fruity environments.

Consumables.name: Root Binding Rope
Consumables.description: A rope that can entangle and bind when activated.

Consumables.name: Sap Sticky Bomb
Consumables.description: A bomb that explodes into sticky sap, immobilizing targets.
